## Lesson goals and objectives

<br/>

### Learning goals

- Describe how to build and display figures using `r BiocStyle::CRANpkg("ggplot2")`.
- Identify the key differences between `ggplot` objects and base R graphics.
- Introduce the concept of tidy data.

### Learning objectives

- Use the `r BiocStyle::CRANpkg("ggplot2")` package to generate figures from various data sets.
- Overlay multiple layers for the same data on a single plot.
- Use faceting and plotting grids.
- Customise plot themes.
